title: Update the AI triage workflow
body:
**Description of Change**

Using the new things and turning it on!

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

No labels will be applied due to the vague nature of the issue that lacks specificity on backend technologies, features, or platforms.

This issue is not a regression as there is no clear indication of a previous version's functionality being broken.

Additional remarks:
* The issue does not provide enough specific information related to backend rendering technology.
* The title and description do not reference any specific feature or area, making it hard to assign labels.
* There is no information regarding a specific operating system or platform that aligns with available labels.
* Overall, the content lacks details on its nature or impact.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- No labels will be applied because the issue lacks specificity on backend technologies.
- The description is too vague and does not mention a specific feature, bug, or area.
- There is no mention of a particular operating system or platform.
- The issue does not provide sufficient content on its nature or impact.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action   | Item   | Description |
| :------- | :----- | :---------- |
| No Action | - | The issue lacks specificity and does not align with any available labels. |

</details>

_This entire triage process was automated by AI and mistakes may have been made. Please let us know so we can continue to improve._
